name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihi, I knew you'd
say such a thing, [Player].

Y'golonac carries [Player], opens the
sliding door, and proceeds further in.

A bedroom that is quite dark, with no lights on.
It is as if they fell into an inescapable swamp of the abyss—

note:
I never found the lights off version for this background, so...
visually differing between Option 1/2 and Option 3

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihi, let's love each other a lot, [Player].
Not just today, but forever and ever, okay?

The lantern gently floating on the water.
The wish entrusted to its light, was a pure and precious 'desire'.

Y'golonac feels a premonition in the warmth in his chest,
that the wish might come true sooner than expected.

No one knows what the future holds for the two of them.
Under the holy night, 'dreams' appear and vanish, just like champagne bubbles—
